summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.event: At least 11 people are killed (and the perpetrator) and
events.details: At least 11 people are killed (and the perpetrator) and another 15 are injured after a gunman opens fire at an adult education centre in Örebro , Sweden, the deadliest mass shooting in the country's history

events.event: China–United States trade war : China announces export controls and
events.details: China–United States trade war : China announces export controls and increased tariffs on certain American imports in retaliation for Donald Trump's imposition of tariffs on Chinese goods

events.event: Donald Trump announces that the United States will take control
events.details: Donald Trump announces that the United States will take control of the Gaza Strip in an agreement with Israel , and that the U

events.event: military will be in charge of Gaza's reconstruction
events.details: military will be in charge of Gaza's reconstruction

events.event: 2025 Liechtenstein general election : The Patriotic Union , led
events.details: 2025 Liechtenstein general election : The Patriotic Union , led by Brigitte Haas , retains its plurality of 10 seats in the Landtag

events.event: The Baltic states complete synchronization of their power grids with
events.details: The Baltic states complete synchronization of their power grids with continental Europe's grid , disconnecting from Russia's grid

events.event: A bus falls off a bridge over the Las Vacas
events.details: A bus falls off a bridge over the Las Vacas River in Guatemala City , Guatemala, killing at least 55 people, and seriously injuring 9 others

events.event: Klaus Iohannis resigns as President of Romania , making him
events.details: Klaus Iohannis resigns as President of Romania , making him the first Romanian president to do so post- revolution

events.event: Konstantinos Tasoulas is elected President of Greece by the Hellenic
events.details: Konstantinos Tasoulas is elected President of Greece by the Hellenic Parliament after four rounds in the 2025 Greek presidential election

events.event: Mahamoud Ali Youssouf is elected as the chairperson of the
events.details: Mahamoud Ali Youssouf is elected as the chairperson of the African Union Commission

events.event: 2025 Indonesian protests : A series of ongoing nationwide protests
events.details: 2025 Indonesian protests : A series of ongoing nationwide protests are held following the enactment of a legislation increasing military involvement in civilian government roles

events.event: A four-hour summit between the US and Russia is held
events.details: A four-hour summit between the US and Russia is held in Saudi Arabia

events.event: Egypt announces the discovery of Thutmose II 's tomb by
events.details: Egypt announces the discovery of Thutmose II 's tomb by a joint British-Egyptian team, the first royal tomb to be discovered since Tutankhamun 's in 1922

events.event: Following a constitutional reform, Nicaragua becomes a diarchy with spouses
events.details: Following a constitutional reform, Nicaragua becomes a diarchy with spouses Daniel Ortega and Rosario Murillo as co-presidents

events.event: It is the 15th and final pharaoh tomb from the
events.details: It is the 15th and final pharaoh tomb from the Eighteenth Dynasty of Egypt to have been found by archeologists

events.event: Vladimir Putin announces that Russia and the United States have
events.details: Vladimir Putin announces that Russia and the United States have officially agreed to restore diplomatic relations

events.event: Croatia completes the process of joining the European Economic Area
events.details: Croatia completes the process of joining the European Economic Area

events.event: 2025 German federal election : After being pushed forward as
events.details: 2025 German federal election : After being pushed forward as a result of the 2024 German government crisis , the centre-right CDU/CSU becomes the largest party, with big gains from the far-right AfD , resulting in a second-place finish

events.event: All 17 occupants onboard and 29 people on the ground
events.details: All 17 occupants onboard and 29 people on the ground die

events.event: An Antonov An-26 of the Sudanese Air Force crashes in
events.details: An Antonov An-26 of the Sudanese Air Force crashes in a residential area, near the Wadi Seidna Air Base

events.event: JD Vance sharply criticise Zelenskyy, raising questions about support for
events.details: JD Vance sharply criticise Zelenskyy, raising questions about support for Ukraine , a proposed end to the war , and the country's future in general
